name: Nothing but Nodes - GMTK 2021 Game Jam
name_original: Nothing but Nodes - GMTK 2021 Game Jam
description:
Controls: 

  • Just  a mouse/trackpad
  • No keyboard and definitely no spacebar

Nothing But Nodes is a  game in which the player clicks number nodes to draw them in to get as many points as possible before running out of moves.
Made in 48 hours for the GMTK Jam 2021. This was our first jam, and we're super proud of how it turned out. If you had fun playing it, please rate and comment!

Check out this itch.io page for more awesome games!

Credits:

Music/Sounds: From freesound.org, Used with Attribution 

Sounds by frankum, deraj, and Opsaaaaa

Leaderboard: Hosted with PlayFab

CSS: Some code borrowed from alienmelon with permission
